item.title: UBS fined €75,000 for harassing two whistleblowers who exposed a tax-dodging scheme for French clients
item.description: UBS and its French subsidiary were also convicted of setting up a system of tax evasion between 2004 and 2012.

item.title: As Ukraine and U.S. Cease-Fire Talks Begin, Gulfs Remain
item.description: American and Ukrainian representatives are meeting in Saudi Arabia, but the United States, Ukraine and Russia envisage very different paths to peace.

item.title: Pardons and Paybacks Are Trump’s Two Modes of Justice
